attributes.action: hold a Referendum, allowing the public to vote on the EU Contitution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Number 10 is willing to surrender the power to vote, and veto, crucial areas of EU policy. This only increases the likelihood of a European 'super state', and more power being given to Brussels, regarding OUR lives, via the back door where the General Public is not even made aware.
